item.title: 奇货可居：中国空军如何与美国抗衡（播客）
item.description: 最近在北京举行的阅兵式再次引发了人们对中美两军相对实力的质疑。同时，由于最近的全球冲突（包括今年早些时候印度和巴基斯坦之间的冲突），我们获得了关于某些硬件在战场或天空中实际表现如何的新数据。另外，据了解，中国正在研制一种新型第六代战斗机，并已播放了一些相关视频。那么，在尖端技术方面，谁更胜一筹呢？【原文：The recent parade in Beijing once again raised questions about the relative strengths of the US and Chinese militaries. Separately, China is known to be working on a new 6th generation fighter for which some video has been shown. So who is ahead in terms of both cutting edge technol】

item.title: 什么是雪球衍生品，融化后会发生什么？
item.description: 中国的投资者正重新涌入一种被称为 "雪球 "的高风险衍生产品，这可能会让金融监管机构感到失望。【原文：Investors in China are piling back into a risky category of derivatives known as snowballs, potentially frustrating financial regulators who tried to rein in the products last year when they exacerbated a stock market slump.】

item.title: 投机狂热降温，迷你拉布布价格从峰值下跌 24
item.description: 在中国的二级市场上，拉布布收藏品曾经获得的溢价正在缩小，这表明随着收藏者对亚洲最受追捧的设计师玩具的价值越来越谨慎，投机性需求正在消退。【原文：The premium once commanded by Labubu collectibles is narrowing in secondary markets in China, signaling fading speculative demand as collectors grow cautious about the value of Asia’s most hyped designer toys.】

item.title: 美国教会威胁驱逐香港名校
item.description: 香港一所提供美式教育的顶尖学校的运营者被其美国创始人起诉，并面临可能被驱逐的威胁。【原文：The operator of a top Hong Kong school that offers an American-style education is being sued by its US-based founder and threatened with possible eviction.】

item.title: Nebius 为人工智能计划融资 37.5 亿美元，债务交易得到推动
item.description: Nebius Group NV 通过出售可转换票据和股票筹集了约 37.5 亿美元，因为该公司希望在与微软公司签订大规模合同后购买更多土地和计算资源。【原文：Nebius Group NV raised about $3.75 billion through selling convertible notes and stock as the firm looks to buy more land and computing resources following a massive contract with Microsoft Corp.】

item.title: 随着房地产投资信托基金上市，新加坡将迎来 2025 年第二大 IPO
item.description: 新加坡将迎来本年度第二大上市活动，因为这个城市国家正试图重振其证券交易所，并缩小与那些在首次公开募股活动中突飞猛进的地区竞争对手之间的差距。【原文：Singapore is poised for its second-largest listing of the year, as the city-state attempts to revive its stock exchange and close a gap with regional rivals that have surged ahead with initial public offerings.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯外国投资机构峰会将在东京举行，这是深化亚洲关系的最新迹象
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的投资峰会的组织者计划在东京举办新版峰会，因为沙特阿拉伯王国正努力加深与日本金融机构的联系。【原文：The organizer of Saudi Arabia’s biggest investment summit plans to take a new version of the event to Tokyo as the kingdom seeks to deepen ties with Japanese financial institutions.】

item.title: 英国拨备 1.69 亿美元后，FirstRand 利润创历史新高
item.description: FirstRand Ltd. 增加了准备金，以支付与英国汽车贷款销售失误的长期调查有关的潜在赔偿和其他费用，即使在增加准备金后，该公司的利润仍创下了历史新高。【原文：FirstRand Ltd.’s profit rose to a record even after increasing provisions to cover potential compensation and other costs linked to a long-running probe into missold car loans in the UK.】

item.title: 印度 Tega 公司将以 15 亿美元收购 AIP 附属公司 Molycop 电动汽车公司
item.description: Tega Industries Ltd. 同意以 15 亿美元的企业估值收购总部位于奥马哈的采矿设备制造商 Molycop 的控制权。【原文：Tega Industries Ltd. has agreed to acquire control of Omaha-based mining equipment maker Molycop at an enterprise valuation of $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 阿达尼结束贿赂案的申请在动荡的美印关系中陷入僵局
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）为解决美国对其提出的欺诈指控所做的努力已陷入僵局，从而延长了阻碍阿达尼集团全球扩张计划的监管悬置。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s efforts to get US fraud charges against him resolved have stalled, according to people familiar with the matter, prolonging the regulatory overhang that has hobbled the Adani Group’s global expansion plans.】

item.title: 尽管墨西哥征税，中国汽车制造商仍可能保持价格优势
item.description: 墨西哥计划对来自中国的汽车征收高达 50%的关税，这可能不会对亚洲国家的汽车制造商造成太大影响，因为这些制造商的生产成本本来就较低，这意味着他们的汽车仍然具有竞争力。【原文：Mexico’s plan to levy tariffs of up to 50% on vehicles from China may not unduly impact the Asian nation’s auto manufacturers whose inherently lower production costs mean their cars are still competitive.】

item.title: 花旗首席执行官认为美国经济衰退可能性不大，交易量将回升
item.description: 花旗集团首席执行官表示，随着美国公司从更明确的政策信号中获得信心，兼并活动正在反弹，世界最大经济体出现衰退的可能性不大。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s chief executive said merger activity is rebounding as US companies gain confidence from clearer policy signals, with a recession in the world’s largest economy looking unlikely.】

item.title: 印度领导人重启贸易谈判，美国国防团队前往印度
item.description: 新德里官员表示，美国国防部和波音公司高管组成的一个小组预计将于下周访问印度，就价值约 40 亿美元的侦察机销售事宜进行谈判，两国正寻求重启贸易谈判。【原文：A team from the US Defense Department and Boeing Co. executives are expected to visit India next week to negotiate the sale of about $4 billion of surveillance aircraft, officials in New Delhi said, as the two countries seek to revive trade talks.】

item.title: 中国数据中心公司 Zdata 寻求 5 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国数据中心公司Zdata Technologies Co.正在寻求约5亿美元的私人债务，以资助在马来西亚的一个项目。【原文：Chinese data center firm Zdata Technologies Co. is seeking private debt of around $500 million to fund a project in Malaysia, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to the wave of similar deals in Asia as the demand for digital infrastructure surges.】

item.title: 发现公司因南非保险业增长而实现创纪录利润
item.description: Discovery Ltd. 的年度利润增长了 30%，创下历史新高，这主要得益于其南非健康保险业务和 Vitality 特许经营业务的大幅增长。【原文：Discovery Ltd.’s annual profit rose 30% to a record, paced by a jump in its South African health-insurance businesses and its Vitality franchise that benefitted from folding the global wellness program into a single business.】

item.title: 据说塔塔资本计划在 10 月初首次公开募股 20 亿美元
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，塔塔资本有限公司正在为 10 月上半月的首次公开募股做准备，此前该公司曾请求印度储备银行短暂延长上市时间表。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. is preparing for an initial public offering in the first half of October after asking the Reserve Bank of India for a short extension to the launch timetable, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国考虑帮助地方政府支付 1 万亿美元账单
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正准备处理地方政府拖欠私营部门的大量积压账单，据估计，拖欠金额超过 1 万亿美元。【原文：China is preparing to tackle the significant backlog of unpaid bills owed by local governments to the private sector, according to people familiar with the matter, an amount of arrears some have estimated at over $1 trillion.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚增税后通胀率飙升至两年新高
item.description: 罗马尼亚通胀加速，达到两年来的最快速度，原因是为提高预算收入而增加税收，加剧了能源和燃料价格上涨的影响。【原文：Romanian inflation accelerated to the fastest pace in two years as an increase in taxes needed to improve budget revenue compounded the impact of higher energy and fuel prices.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市走高，英镑在 1.35 美元附近徘徊
印度计划在减税后保留市场借贷目标
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度计划在本财年下半年保持借贷计划不变，并消化近期消费税削减带来的任何收入损失。【原文：India plans to keep its borrowing program unchanged for the second half of the financial year and absorb any revenue losses from recent consumption tax cuts, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: SMG控股公司在瑞士首次公开募股中寻求高达11亿美元的投资
item.description: SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG 的股东希望通过首次公开募股筹集多达 9.03 亿瑞士法郎（约合 11 亿美元）的资金，这将是今年迄今为止欧洲最大的首次公开募股之一。【原文：SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG’s shareholders are looking to raise as much as 903 million Swiss francs ($1.1 billion) in an initial public offering, which would mark one of Europe’s largest so far this year.】

item.title: 马来西亚工业产值出人意料，为利率决定提供依据
item.description: 马来西亚的工业生产连续第二个月以快于预期的速度增长，凸显了经济复苏的迹象，促使央行上周维持利率不变。【原文：Malaysia’s industrial production grew at a faster-than-expected pace for a second straight month, underscoring signs of a resilient economy that prompted the central bank to keep interest rates unchanged last week.】

item.title: 瑞典诺巴银行宣布斯德哥尔摩首次公开募股计划
item.description: 瑞典金融服务集团诺巴银行集团（NOBA Bank Group AB）宣布计划在斯德哥尔摩进行首次公开募股，为欧洲今年最繁忙的首次股票销售交易所带来了新的动力。【原文：Swedish financial services group NOBA Bank Group AB announced plans to launch an initial public offering in Stockholm, bringing new momentum to Europe’s busiest exchange for first-time share sales this year.】

item.title: Quadrille Capital 为科技投资融资 5 亿欧元
item.description: 风险投资和成长型股权投资管理公司 Quadrille Capital 募集了 5 亿欧元（5.87 亿美元）资金，用于投资美国和欧洲科技领域的成长型公司。【原文：Quadrille Capital, an investment manager in venture capital and growth equity, has raised €500 million ($587 million) to invest in growth companies in the US and European technology sectors.】

item.title: 本田在日本推出售价 1.83 万美元的电动 Kei 汽车，与日产汽车一较高下
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）为日本市场推出了其首款轻型电动乘用车，并打赌这款新车型可能有助于启动日本市场对更环保汽车的需求。【原文：Honda Motor Co. unveiled its first lightweight electric passenger car for the Japanese market, betting the new model may help kickstart demand for greener vehicles in the country.】

item.title: 需求出现疲软迹象，中国钢厂受到挤压
item.description: 铁矿石的涨势与中国钢铁需求的低迷形成了鲜明对比，即使在中国传统的建筑旺季到来之际，钢厂仍受到挤压。【原文：Iron ore’s rally is clashing with sluggish Chinese steel demand, leaving mills squeezed even as the nation’s construction season traditionally picks up at this time of year.】

item.title: Vantage 数据中心从阿布扎比 GIC 融资 16 亿美元
item.description: Vantage Data Centers 已获得 16 亿美元的投资，以帮助扩大其在亚太地区的业务，包括在马来西亚收购一个数据中心园区。【原文：Vantage Data Centers has secured a $1.6 billion investment to help expand its business in the Asia-Pacific region, including the acquisition of a data center campus in Malaysia.】

item.title: 中国因削减养猪场数量以应对供过于求而传唤养猪企业
item.description: 中国政府召集最大的养猪企业讨论减产措施，这是中国政府为解决供过于求和提振价格而采取的最新举措。【原文：China’s government has summoned its biggest pig breeders to discuss measures to cut production, in its latest move to tackle oversupply and bolster prices.】

item.title: 区块链支持的贷款机构 Figure 和支持者在首次公开募股中筹集到 7.875 亿美元资金
item.description: 基于区块链的信贷公司Figure Technology Solutions Inc.及其部分支持者在首次公开募股中筹集了7.875亿美元，股票定价高于市场定价范围。【原文：Blockchain-based credit company Figure Technology Solutions Inc. and some of its backers raised $787.5 million in an initial public offering, pricing shares above a marketed range.】
